article_title: PixelOptics leaves ex-CEO with broken dreams
article_text:
Print Subscriber Access (non 7-day)

$1.99 for 30 days

CURRENT SUBSCRIBERS: Add unlimited access to our digital content, including roanoke.com and our eTimes, to your current print subscription for just $1.99 for the first month.

The $1.99 will be billed to your credit card immediately by PayPalPro. After the first month, your total susbscription price will be $15.47 per month.

og.description: Ron Blum still walks around his Roanoke house in an old pair of emPower, the electronic eyeglasses he invented more than a decade ago. He’s never been one to miss an opportunity to show off the technology that he said took off “like a rocket” in 2011 and carried billion-dollar revenue opportunities.
